Question
========
  
What are we trying to establish with reliability analysis?


Answerlist
----------
* How much of the test variance is true variance and not explained by random measurement error
* How much of the test variance is true variance and not explained by systematic measurement error
* To what extent the test measures what it is intended to measure
* The correlation between two halves of the test
